text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao aah li kitea b. puok anak min sthetnow leu( sasanea) avei laey louhtrate puok anak brate b tde tam kompir ta vr t ning kompir ainh chil haeyning avei del trauv ban ke banhchouh mk aoy puok anak pi mcheasa robsa puok anak . haey avei del trauv ban banhchouh mk aoy anak pi mcheasa robsa anaknoh vea rutte thveu aoy puokke pheak chraen meankar bampean ning brachheang themtiet . dau che neah chaur anak kom pruoy baromph champoh krom del brachheang noh aoy saoh
